publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1436# Mr Lloyd Quinan: Autistic Spectrum Disorder Provision-That the Parliament notes that the incidence of Autistic Spectrum Disorder has rapidly increased in the last ten years; further notes the challenge faced by parents, carers and organisations such as the Strathclyde Autistic Society regarding the lack of appropriate provision, and urges rapid action to address and rectify the current situation.
S1M-1436# Autistic Spectrum Disorder Provision (lodged on 6 December 2000) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-1436# Mr Lloyd Quinan: Autistic Spectrum Disorder Provision-That the Parliament notes that the incidence of Autistic Spectrum Disorder has rapidly increased in the last ten years; further notes the challenge faced by parents, carers and organisations such as the Strathclyde Autistic Society regarding the lack of appropriate provision, and urges rapid action to address and rectify the current situation. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Tommy Sheridan, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-1436# Autistic Spectrum Disorder Provision (lodged on 6 December 2000) Mr Andrew Welsh*, Fergus Ewing*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-1436# Autistic Spectrum Disorder Provision (lodged on 6 December 2000) Alex Neil*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Alasdair Morgan*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-1436# Autistic Spectrum Disorder Provision (lodged on 6 December 2000) Andrew Wilson*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Colin Campbell*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*

S1M-1436# Mr Lloyd Quinan: Autistic Spectrum Disorder Provision-That the Parliament notes that the incidence of Autistic Spectrum Disorder has rapidly increased in the last ten years; further notes the challenge faced by parents, carers and organisations such as the Strathclyde Autistic Society regarding the lack of appropriate provision, and urges rapid action to address and rectify the current situation. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Tommy Sheridan, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Andrew Welsh, Fergus Ewing, Tricia Marwick, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Alex Neil, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Alasdair Morgan, Christine Grahame, Andrew Wilson, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Colin Campbell, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr John McAllion*
S1M-1436 Lloyd Quinan: Autistic Spectrum Disorder Provision Supported by: Tavish Scott*
S1M-1436# Autistic Spectrum Disorder Provision (lodged on 6 December 2000) David Mundell*, Robin Harper*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-1436# Autistic Spectrum Disorder Provision (lodged on 6 December 2000) Des McNulty*, Scott Barrie*, Nick Johnston*, Mary Scanlon*

S1M-1436# Mr Lloyd Quinan: Autistic Spectrum Disorder Provisionâ€”That the Parliament notes that the incidence of Autistic Spectrum Disorder has rapidly increased in the last ten years; further notes the challenge faced by parents, carers and organisations such as the Strathclyde Autistic Society regarding the lack of appropriate provision, and urges rapid action to address and rectify the current situation. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Tommy Sheridan, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Andrew Welsh, Fergus Ewing, Tricia Marwick, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Alex Neil, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Alasdair Morgan, Christine Grahame, Andrew Wilson, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Colin Campbell, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr John McAllion, David Mundell, Robin Harper, Fiona McLeod, Des McNulty, Scott Barrie, Nick Johnston, Mary Scanlon
